name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Field Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in providing exceptional **technical support** and **troubleshooting** for diagnostic software in the healthcare domain. I am proficient in managing **preventative maintenance** and **corrective maintenance** processes while ensuring compliance with standards such as **IEC60601-1** and **IEC62353**. My hands-on expertise includes utilizing **SAP Field Service Management** to enhance operational efficiency and improve customer service. 
I possess strong **project management** capabilities, coupled with a keen analytical reasoning approach, ensuring timely detection and resolution of issues. My excellent **communication** skills and commitment to **teamwork** allow me to effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality solutions. I bring a solid foundation in **full-stack development** with technologies like **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, as well as experience in **cloud services** on **AWS** and **Azure**.

experience.responsibilities:
Provided high-quality **technical support** for robotics and diagnostic software, ensuring timely solutions for customer inquiries and issues.
Conducted **preventative maintenance** and **corrective maintenance** on medical equipment in compliance with **IEC60601-1** and **IEC62353** standards to minimize downtime and enhance equipment reliability.
Managed projects effectively, coordinating with cross-functional teams to resolve technical challenges and improve service delivery through organized **project management** methodologies.
Communicated complex technical concepts clearly to clients and team members, demonstrating strong **communication** and **teamwork** skills to foster collaboration and understanding.
Utilized **SAP Field Service Management** to track service requests and maintain customer relationships, ensuring high levels of **customer service**.
Diagnosed technical issues swiftly and accurately using **analytical reasoning**, leading to efficient troubleshooting and resolution of robotics and diagnostic software challenges.
Executed on-site inspections and repairs, servicing **9** different types of equipment across **6** healthcare facilities monthly, contributing to enhanced operational efficiency.
Trained junior engineers on best practices in maintenance and support, promoting knowledge sharing and continuous learning within the team.

Delivered exemplary **customer service** through effective communication and teamwork in support of robotics and diagnostic software used in the medical field.
Managed **preventative and corrective maintenance** for medical equipment in accordance with **IEC60601-1** and **IEC62353** standards, ensuring optimal performance and compliance with safety regulations across over **150** devices.
Enhanced the technical support process through meticulous **troubleshooting** that resolved **95%** of field issues on the first visit, significantly improving operational efficiency.
Utilized **SAP Field Service Management** to streamline workflow and project management, leading to a **30%** reduction in service response time.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to implement innovative solutions and optimized processes, contributing to a **20%** increase in overall service satisfaction metrics.
Leveraged analytical reasoning to assess equipment failures and formulate strategic maintenance plans, minimizing downtime for critical medical systems.
Trained and mentored junior field engineers in best practices and troubleshooting techniques, fostering a collaborative and knowledgeable team environment where more than **10** engineers improved their skill set.
Performed comprehensive diagnostics on field equipment, ensuring adherence to industry standards and enhancing the reliability of medical devices.

- Provided exceptional **customer service** and **technical support** by diagnosing and resolving issues with **diagnostic software** within a timely manner, ensuring a **99%** first-response rate.
- Conducted **preventative maintenance** and **corrective maintenance** on critical systems, adhering to **IEC60601-1** and **IEC62353** standards to ensure compliance and safety in medical equipment operations.
- Executed **troubleshooting** procedures effectively, contributing to a **30%** reduction in equipment downtime and improving operational efficiency for clients.
- Managed field service operations through **SAP Field Service Management**, streamlining workflow and coordination efforts to enhance project delivery by **40%**.
- Collaborated in **project management** efforts, working closely with cross-functional teams to ensure timely completion of service requests and enhancements, positively impacting client satisfaction ratings by **25%**.
- Demonstrated strong **analytical reasoning** skills to identify trends and insights within service data, leading to actionable recommendations for service improvements and efficiency gains.
- Maintained clear and effective **communication** with clients and team members, fostering a collaborative work environment and ensuring transparency in service processes.
- Encouraged **teamwork** among multidisciplinary teams to promote knowledge sharing and continuous improvement in service delivery strategies, enhancing overall team performance.

	MLflow, Airflow, Kubeflow, Keycloak, Nginx, Certbot, robotics, technical support, diagnostic software, preventative maintenance, corrective maintenance, IEC60601-1, IEC62353, customer service, troubleshooting, SAP Field Service Management, project management, analytical reasoning, communication, teamwork
